name: Floatland (TriJam#179)
description:
This is a little endless-jumping-platformer game created in only roughly 3 hours pure coding time for the TriJam#179 - The Three-Hour-Jam in July, 2022.

You are a bouncing ball. All you can do is bounce. You can not stop.

Do not fall off!

I hope, you enjoy this short endless-bouncing...thing :-)!
Comments and feedback very welcome! Let me know, what you think!

Yours, Gris.
